column5: Last Fall I asked Chris to build me a Laker/Whitie Rod. I received the package as promised.  However it was only catching Whities!!!!  Until  The Catch     The Release      Thanks Chris  Deal Completed  Rick
Hot Damn! That's a tank Rick! Even better that it still swims and the rod is still in one piece.  Curious though, was it a clipper?
Let's see a pic of the rod. Nice LT BTW.
Well done Rick!!! That trout was definitely worth the wait
Yeah, BABY!!!  Very nice fish!!  Think I might need one of those rods
nice fish  pic and description of the rod would be great
Wow, that's a cow!!!!  Good job!
Beauty Laker!  Hoping to land something like that on Sunday!
How come the rod you built me didn't catch fish like that? Never mind I am sure you are just going to say it is my fault.   Art
What a beast!!!!  Way to go, and as stated, specs on rod and fish would be nice
What a fatty !!! Nice fish too !

The Fish  Not sure if it was clipped!! Obviously the side in the Pic was not!!  I wanted to get Her back in the swim as soon as possible.  Weight I am guessing about the 12lb mark.   The Rod.  I asked Spiel for A Laker/Whitie Ice Rod, about 32" and Med/Heavy action, Large Eyes and to be used with Spinning Gear,  The Rest I left up to Him!!   The result       Rick
Very nice laker Rick!  Spiel is a master.
